channel.title: Asp.Net Web Api on Simon Gilbert Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Asp.Net Web Api on Simon Gilbert Blog

item.title: [Full Stack Web] Show & Hide Password Form Submit - ReactJS + Redux + C# ASP.Net Core
item.description: Coding HTML password forms? Simon Gilbert explains how to show an hide password values using ReactJS, Redux, C# ASP.Net Core

item.title: [Full Stack Web] Reverse Geo Location Lookup - ReactJS + Redux + C# ASP.Net Core
item.description: Reverse engineering geo location? Simon Gilbert explains this via postcodes.io using ReactJS, Redux, C# ASP.Net Core

item.title: [Full Stack Web] Client-Side Validation Postback - ReactJS + Redux + C# ASP.Net Core
item.description: Need to validate data integrity? Simon Gilbert explains SPA client-side validation using ReactJS, Redux, C# ASP.Net Core

item.title: [Full Stack] Single Page App (SPA) - ReactJs + Redux + Bootstrap 4 + ASP.Net Core
item.description: Need to code full stack? Simon Gilbert explains how to setup a SPA using ReactJS, Redux, C# ASP.Net Core & Bootstrap 4

item.title: Unified MVC & Web Api Controllers - C# ASP.Net Core
item.description: Coding both MVC & Web Api combined? Simon Gilbert details unified MVC View & Web Api endpoint controllers in C# ASP.Net Core

item.title: Rate Limiting RESTful Api Requests using Action Filter Attributes - C# ASP.Net Core Web Api
item.description: Need to rate limit your Api? Simon Gilbert explains how to use action filter attributes in C# ASP.Net Core Web Api

item.title: Documenting your RESTful C# ASP.Net Core Web Api using Swashbuckle & Swagger
item.description: Need to document your RESTful Api? Simon Gilbert explains how to document endpoints using Swashbuckle Swagger for C# ASP.Net Core Web Api

item.title: RESTful CRUD Api using Entity Framework Core's In-Memory (O/RM) Database - C# ASP.Net Core Web Api
item.description: Need an in-memory database? Simon Gilbert explains Microsoft Entity Framework Core’s’ in-memory O/RM database as a CRUD layer in ASP.Net Core Web Api

item.title: Cross-Platform SMS RESTful Api using Twilio - C# ASP.Net Core Web Api
item.description: Looking to send SMS to your users? Simon Gilbert discusses how to construct a cross-platform RESTful API for sending SMS messages using the Twilio platform and C# ASP.Net Core Web Api in Visual Studio for Mac.
